nodes.text: The OHS4140-02 system was located in the Ash Worlds sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. Between 25,120 BBY and 25,096 BBY, it was known as the Balshebr system and was situated in the Kiirium Reaches region, a part of the empire of the Tionese conqueror Xim. During that time, the Balshebr system was connected by hyperlanes to the Astigone, Dellalt, and Ulonsus systems, and Xim moved his forces to the system from Dellalt.
The OHS4140-02 system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in grid square T-7.
